text: Christian Weber (1 July 1946 – 12 February 2019) was a German politician. He was the President of the Parliament of Bremen (Bürgerschaft) from 1999 to 2019 and a member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD). He was born in Mirsk, Krobica, Poland. Weber died after a long illness on 12 February 2019 in Bremen, aged 72. == References == Category:1946 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Politicians from Bremen (state) Category:Disease-related deaths in Germany
title: Christian Weber
